abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired a team of three investment bankers specializing in the power industry from Credit Suisse, the firm announced in an internal memorandum.
snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired a team of three investment bankers specializing in the power industry from Credit Suisse, the firm announced in an internal memorandum.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America Merrill Lynch has hired a team of three investment bankers specializing in the power industry from Credit Suisse, the firm announced in an internal memorandum reviewed by DealBook on Wednesday.

headline.main: Bank of America Hires 3 Power Specialists From Credit Suisse

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
